definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: L-histidine is an alkalescence amino acid with an imidazole group.
sentences.chinese: 組氨酸是含咪唑核的鹼性氨基酸。

sentences.english: In chapter 4, we study the conformations and properties of histidine and its related ions.
sentences.chinese: 第四章研究了氣相組氨酸及其相關離子的構型和性質。
